alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Franklin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 07 at 6:09PM EST until March 08 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Whitewater River at Brookville. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Brookville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows into some yards, as well as campgrounds near Cedar Grove and New Trenton, with lowland flooding also occurring in West Harrison, Indiana and Harrison, Ohio, especially near the Lawrenceburg Road area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested. The river is expected to fall below action stage early Tuesday morning. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
